info.name: HorriblePP Dark Mode
info.description: Changes the color scheme and default background colors to darker variations
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.1.2
Date of release: December 19th, 2022.
GitHub: https://github.com/Tiramonium/HorriblePP.Dark.Mode

Version changes:
- Adapted to major Disqus style update
- Overrode its newly stablished style variables
- Replaced the fixed post ugly pin icon
- Repositioned the fixed post above the new post textarea
